paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The 104 pathogenic BRCA mutations were present in 154 individuals.

functional_data.summary: Pathogenic mutations lead to complete loss of function through generation of a truncated protein.

variants.additional_notes: The pathogenic mutations were identified in individuals with breast and ovarian cancer.
key_quotes: The highest frequency of BRCA pathogenic mutations was 17.8% (66/370) in ovarian cancer followed by 5.0% (39/779) in breast cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was identified as pathogenic in the context of breast and ovarian cancer.
